member.name: F:Asm.As.Oib.DisplayService.Contracts.Data.Types.AcknowledgementType.Originator
member.summary: Message can be acknowledged only by the sending client. To remove (acknowledge) it, the sender needs to call the RevokeMessage method.

member.name: F:Asm.As.Oib.DisplayService.Contracts.Data.Types.AcknowledgementType.OneReceiver
member.summary: Message can be acknowledged by a confirmation on the receiver As soon as it was confirmed by at least one receiver, it is removed (acknowledged)

member.name: F:Asm.As.Oib.DisplayService.Contracts.Data.Types.AcknowledgementType.AllReceivers
member.summary: Message must be acknowledged by all receivers. Only when it was confirmed by all receivers, it is removed (acknowledged)
